    • Method Detail

      • setType

        public DiskTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setType(DiskTypes.HostBusAdapterType type)
        Type of host bus adapter to which the device should be attached. If null, guest-specific default values will be used
        Parameters:
        type - New value for the property.

      • setIde

        public DiskTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setIde(IdeAddressSpec ide)
        Address for attaching the device to a virtual IDE adapter. If null, the server will choose an available address; if none is available, the request will fail.
        Parameters:
        ide - New value for the property.

      • setScsi

        public DiskTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setScsi(ScsiAddressSpec scsi)
        Address for attaching the device to a virtual SCSI adapter. If null, the server will choose an available address; if none is available, the request will fail.
        Parameters:
        scsi - New value for the property.

      • setSata

        public DiskTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setSata(SataAddressSpec sata)
        Address for attaching the device to a virtual SATA adapter. If null, the server will choose an available address; if none is available, the request will fail.
        Parameters:
        sata - New value for the property.

      • setBacking

        public DiskTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setBacking(DiskTypes.BackingSpec backing)
        Existing physical resource backing for the virtual disk. Exactly one of getBacking() or getNewVmdk() must be specified. If null, the virtual disk will not be connected to an existing backing.
        Parameters:
        backing - New value for the property.

      • setNewVmdk

        public DiskTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setNewVmdk(DiskTypes.VmdkCreateSpec newVmdk)
        Specification for creating a new VMDK backing for the virtual disk. Exactly one of getBacking() or getNewVmdk() must be specified. If null, a new VMDK backing will not be created.
        Parameters:
        newVmdk - New value for the property.
